'''''Minecraft Now''''' was a series of online livestreams produced by [[Mojang Studios]], where development information regarding ''[[Minecraft]]'' was presented, alongside community creations, live gameplay, and a Q&A with the developers.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-now-coming-youtube|Minecraft Now is coming to YouTube|December 2, 2021}}</ref> The livestreams began with the first edition on December 9, 2021,<ref>{{ytl|I7nHnsAwTIc|Minecraft Now (well, soon anyway!) – Official Trailer|Minecraft|December 2, 2021}}</ref> and concluded on November 24th, 2022, being succeeded by ''[[Minecraft Monthly]]''.
